LABEL: 0x25E
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0x2A1
STRING: I'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0x2FE
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average. I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0x381
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0x3F0
STRING: We're still second years though. I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0x465
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, fearing a black mark on their report, so no one dares to stand out.

LABEL: 0x4EE
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0x56D
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future. Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0x5D4
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0x623
STRING: While I was walking around absentmindedly, someone pat my back.

LABEL: 0x725
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x733
STRING: "Good morning, Metarou!"

LABEL: 0x809
STRING: When I turned around, I saw a couple holding each other's arms in a friendly manner.

LABEL: 0x931
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x93F
STRING: "Yo. You're up early today."

LABEL: 0xA0F
STRING: Nana and Yukimaru. They're both childhood friends of mine and we've known each other since kindergarten.

LABEL: 0xA7A
STRING: The three of us used to play together a lot because we lived in the same neighbourhood.

LABEL: 0xAE1
STRING: As soon as she entered high school, it seems that Nana suddenly became aware of Yukimaru as a man.

LABEL: 0xB4C
STRING: They haven't told me anything in particular, though.

LABEL: 0xBA1
STRING: Oh dear, I guess I'm being left out, aren't I? Not like you're hiding it or anything.

LABEL: 0xBE8
STRING: The two of you, hand in hand... you've been showing off since the morning.

LABEL: 0xC53
STRING: They seem to be getting along as well as ever. Really, they're perfect for each other.

LABEL: 0xCB3
STRING: I don't think there's any room for me to intervene. Of course, having said that...

LABEL: 0xDF6
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xE04
STRING: "Ah! Hey, Yukimaru. Isn't Metarou jealous of us?"

LABEL: 0xF89
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xF97
STRING: "Yeah, poor thing... he's probably jealous of our lovey-doveyness."

LABEL: 0x112E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x113C
STRING: "Poor Metarou, he's too ugly so he's not popular, pff!"

LABEL: 0x12D3
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x12E1
STRING: "Ah, I know! Shall I act as his producer?"

LABEL: 0x13DA
STRING: I dodged Nana's provocations neatly. ...However I'm annoyed on the inside.

LABEL: 0x143F
STRING: I'm used to their sarcastic remarks. They're not bullies or anything, it's just the way they joke around.

LABEL: 0x14B3
STRING: We've been messing around with each other a lot for a long time, so something like this is perfectly normal.

LIST.STRING: You've got a messed up face too.
You'll get dumped with such ugly personality.

LABEL: 0x161E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x162C
STRING: "Ah! Remember what I told you, Metarou? I'm not gonna invite you to karaoke anymore!"

LABEL: 0x17DB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x17E9
STRING: "Well, I'm busy dating Yukimaru, so I don't even have time to play with you〜!"

LABEL: 0x198C
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x199A
STRING: "Come on come on, cut it out you two."

LABEL: 0x1A87
STRING: Yukimaru hesistantly comes between us with a sigh.

LABEL: 0x1AE2
STRING: He's always like that.

LABEL: 0x1B23
STRING: After all, for better or worse, we're all childhood friends...

LABEL: 0x1C6C
STRING: Normal days.

LABEL: 0x1CA9
STRING: In this uninteresting school, I was just one of many.

LABEL: 0x1D06
STRING: I just listen in class. Just study. Just talk with friends...

LABEL: 0x1D61
STRING: I'm not popular. I don't have a girlfriend. It's a really boring life...

LABEL: 0x1DC4
STRING: Aren't the school years usually called "youth"?

LABEL: 0x1E1F
STRING: You know, there's not a single element of this so-called "youth" in my life.

LABEL: 0x1EB1
STRING: My student life...

LABEL: 0x1EEC
STRING: Is it okay to just let it end like this?

LABEL: 0x1F35
STRING: I've always hoped there would be something more exciting.

LABEL: 0x21BE
STRING: After school.

LABEL: 0x21F5
STRING: There was nothing much to do, so I stopped by a nearby park.

LABEL: 0x2256
STRING: I sat down on a bench and ate some yakisoba bread that I had bought at a convenience store earlier.

LABEL: 0x22BF
STRING: Their yakisoba bread has mayonnaise on it. I'm quite fond of it.

LABEL: 0x233C
STRING: In the park square, children are playing energetically.

LABEL: 0x2395
STRING: I looked towards the grass in the corner and saw an unfamiliar sight.

LABEL: 0x23F4
STRING: One girl is talking in front of a tripod.

LABEL: 0x2455
STRING: Mounted on the tripod was an expensive looking video camera. Those gadgets are quite expensive, aren't they?

LABEL: 0x24EE
STRING: I wonder what she's taking videos of in a place like this, all by herself.

LABEL: 0x255F
STRING: Could it be that Usatuber thing that's all the rage these days?

LABEL: 0x25B6
STRING: "Usatube" is a very popular video sharing community.

LABEL: 0x261E
STRING: In short, we call it "Utube."

LABEL: 0x2686
STRING: It's a place where video contributors from all around the world gather.

LABEL: 0x26D5
STRING: The people who upload videos are commonly referred to as "Usatubers" or "Utubers".

LABEL: 0x27E7
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x27F5
STRING: "Heeeyyy!"

LABEL: 0x28ED
STRING: I just realized, but the girl was looking at me and waving.

LABEL: 0x294C
STRING: You're not, uh... calling to me, are you?

LABEL: 0x29A3
STRING: After looking around to confirm that she wasn't calling someone else, I pointed at myself.

LABEL: 0x2ABE
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x2ACC
STRING: "Yes, that's right, that's right! You, the guy over there!"

LABEL: 0x2BDB
STRING: Apparently, it's really me that she's calling.

LABEL: 0x2C3C
STRING: Wh-why, I wonder... I mean, who is that girl...

LABEL: 0x2C93
STRING: Was she an old classmate of mine? No, I don't remember anyone with that fancy hair colour...

LABEL: 0x2CFE
STRING: I decided to walk up to her slowly, even though I was suspicious.

LABEL: 0x2E0E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x2E1C
STRING: "Maaan〜〜〜〜, you're a lifesaver〜!"

LABEL: 0x2EFF
STRING: When she saw that I had arrived, the girl flashed a big smile that exposed her teeth.

LABEL: 0x2F66
STRING: She's dressed in a unique and quite revealing manner. Her hair, almost blonde, was tied into a ponytail hanging down.

LABEL: 0x307F
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x308D
STRING: "Hey mister, sorry to bother you, but can you hold this for me?"

LABEL: 0x322E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x323C
STRING: "Sorry to ask you to do this all of a sudden! Just a short time is enough, please!"

LABEL: 0x333B
STRING: Without knowing why, I did as she asked.

LABEL: 0x33B6
STRING: After handing it to me, she went running off somewhere.

LABEL: 0x3421
STRING: ...Why, she was just looking for some help, wasn't she?

LABEL: 0x3484
STRING: It's not like I know her or anything. Well, of course not... I was stupid to have even a little expectation.

LABEL: 0x3505
STRING: Speaking of which, what did she give to me?

LABEL: 0x3558
STRING: Curious, I looked at the object I was holding.

LABEL: 0x35AA
STRING: I was holding a...

LABEL: 0x3659
STRING: The thing she gave to me was a black, rugged... lump. The surface has bumps like the shell of a turtle.

LABEL: 0x37C7
STRING: Huh? Where have I seen this shape before...

LABEL: 0x3862
STRING: Ah... That's right, this is a grenade...!!

LABEL: 0x38BB
STRING: I didn't notice it at all because the very idea of it was unrealistic.

LABEL: 0x391C
STRING: By the time I thought that far ahead, it was too late.

LABEL: 0x3B35
STRING: My body was scattered to pieces in an instant.

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Terrorist」

LABEL: 0x3D3E
STRING: What the girl gave me was a large number of balloons filled with helium. If I let go of them, they would fly away.

LABEL: 0x3DCF
STRING: I see. She was having trouble trying to find something to fix these balloons to, I guess?

LABEL: 0x3E34
STRING: It must be tough being a one-man operation. I'm not too clear on the details, but I'm sure there're lots of difficulties and painful things behind the scenes.

LABEL: 0x3F17
STRING: After waiting for a while, she came back with a bucket.

LABEL: 0x403F
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x404D
STRING: "Sorry, my bad! Thanks mister, you totally saved me!"

LABEL: 0x413E
STRING: ...I looked at her dubiously.

LABEL: 0x4189
STRING: That's a pretty poor attitude to have after getting someone to do something for you. Sheesh... youngsters these days.

LABEL: 0x42A2
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x42B0
STRING: "Man, I'm sorry! I'm in the middle of filming a video. Right now, my hands are full..."

LABEL: 0x4467
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4475
STRING: "So I was in big trouble, and then, bam, you were right there! You're really a big help! You're my saviour!"

LABEL: 0x4596
STRING: A video... As I thought, she's a Usatuber. These days their numbers have certainly grown... I see people filming all over the city.

LABEL: 0x4627
STRING: But only a handful of them can become famous, and it's probably quite a difficult world for newcomers. This is merely my opinion as an outsider though.

LABEL: 0x46BE
STRING: I wonder if there are a lot of young people who dream of living a free life even in these times.

LABEL: 0x4739
STRING: Compared to me who doesn't have any dreams, I think it's very admirable that they take concrete actions instead of just dreaming about it.

LABEL: 0x47C5
STRING: By the way, I wondered what the balloons were used for. Curious, I decided to ask her.

LABEL: 0x4954
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4962
STRING: "Oho! Are you curious〜?! Do you wanna know〜?! As a special service, I'll tell you!"

LABEL: 0x4B1D
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4B2B
STRING: "'Can humans fly with a large number of balloons?!' I'm gonna test the heck out of that today! Wild, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x4C6E
STRING: "There's no way that can happen," I wanted to retort...

LABEL: 0x4CDB
STRING: I see. Is this one of the popular so-called "mythbusting" videos?

LABEL: 0x4D30
STRING: I can easily imagine men doing stunts like these, but it's surprising to me that a slender woman like her is also doing it.

LABEL: 0x4E55
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4E63
STRING: "Oops, I'm late introducing myself! I'm sure you already know me, but as this is a special occasion..."

LABEL: 0x4F62
STRING: She sucked in some air and her demeanour changed, as if a switch had been flipped.

LABEL: 0x506B
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5079
STRING: "Hello, Usatube! The roll of the dice is four! God knows, Earth knows, I know, You know!"

LABEL: 0x523E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x524C
STRING: "Welcome〜! It's the myth-busting Usatuber 'Cycoh%R(4,Saiko)' live on the Hanabishi Channel, yo〜!"

LABEL: 0x53F6
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5404
STRING: "...How's that? I don't usually do that much fan service you know! You'd better be thankful."

LABEL: 0x572B
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5812
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5820
STRING: "Mmm, so. You. Perhaps, by some very small chance, don't know... who I am?"

LIST.STRING: Of course I do... Who are you again?
I've never heard that name, yo.

LABEL: 0x5A31
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5A3F
STRING: "Woaahhhh〜 Seriousssllly?!!!"

LABEL: 0x5B1E
STRING: Cycoh was quite embarrassed, her face flushed bright red.

LABEL: 0x5B77
STRING: I guess the hype from being in-character was starting to fade...

LABEL: 0x5C8E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5C9C
STRING: "Oh jeez... I've caused a serious misunderstanding! Shit, I'm so embarrassed!!"

LABEL: 0x5D99
STRING: But still, that's kind of cringe. When I think about doing that at the beginning of every video, it makes me feel second-hand embarrassment.

LABEL: 0x5E42
STRING: Without a doubt, this kid is posting a lot of stuff on Usatube that she's going to regret.

LABEL: 0x5F5A
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5F68
STRING: "...Well, who cares! If there're people who don't know me, then I guess I'm still not quite there yet!"

LABEL: 0x610F
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x611D
STRING: "You just watch me, I'm going to get even bigger... and then I'll show you!

LABEL: 0x6214
STRING: I don't know if she's famous online or completely unknown...

LABEL: 0x6269
STRING: Anyway, I just know that she's full of energy. Constantly switching moods.

LABEL: 0x6380
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x638E
STRING: "...By the way, what's your name〜?"

LABEL: 0x6574
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x6582
STRING: "Hahahaha!!! Metarou, you're one funny guy! I like you!!"

LABEL: 0x667F
STRING: Following her lead, I introduced myself in a funny way.

LABEL: 0x66DA
STRING: It seems Cycoh has taken a liking to me.

LABEL: 0x672D
STRING: I don't usually fool around like this... but I kind of wanted to try it.

LABEL: 0x683C
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x684A
STRING: "...Ha! Now ain't the time for this! I gotta make today's video, quickly〜!"

LABEL: 0x6951
STRING: Cycoh's mouth opened wide like in a gag comedy as she hurriedly began her preparations.

LABEL: 0x69BC
STRING: I watched the girl busily filming with a blank stare.

LABEL: 0x6A25
STRING: She has to think of an idea, prepare and present all by herself...

LABEL: 0x6A7C
STRING: It really looks rough...

LIST.STRING: Is there anything I can do?

LABEL: 0x6BAB
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x6BB9
STRING: "You serious?! You'll help a sister out?! Man, you're a super cool guy!!"

LABEL: 0x6D54
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x6D62
STRING: "Thanks, you're a lifesaver!! It was quite tough doing this all alone."

LABEL: 0x6E55
STRING: I was saying it half as a joke, but I was happy to help. I could see it was hard for her...

LABEL: 0x6ECC
STRING: I didn't have anything to do anyway, so this is a good way to pass the time.

LABEL: 0x6F2D
STRING: All's said and done, I'm going to help her.

LABEL: 0x6F8E
STRING: She told me that if she started to float, the wind might blow her away. When that happened, she wanted me to follow her with my camera.

LABEL: 0x7015
STRING: ...No, I don't think you need to worry about that! ...Pff.

LABEL: 0x707A
STRING: Holding back a laugh, I gladly did as she asked anyway.

LABEL: 0x7144
STRING: The balloons are filled with helium gas and inflated, a tedious but essential task.

LABEL: 0x724E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x725C
STRING: "Hahaha!! Why, Metarou, so you're my age〜. Why didn't you say so earlier!"

LABEL: 0x740D
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x741B
STRING: "I haven't been to school in a long time so my sense of the days of the week is all messed up! Haha, I do this every day! It's funny, isn't it? I'm a genuine idiot!"

LABEL: 0x755E
STRING: During this, she talked to me several times, making me laugh.

LABEL: 0x75B7
STRING: I don't usually laugh this much, and I'm starting to feel a little weird about it.

LABEL: 0x7632
STRING: It was kinda like being a kid again.

LABEL: 0x7689
STRING: They're balloons you can buy in a store, around 30 in all. ...I attached all those balloons to her body.

LABEL: 0x7704
STRING: And finally, the experiment begins, and Cycoh starts to lift off...

LABEL: 0x775D
STRING: ...Or, she should have.

LABEL: 0x7798
STRING: Cycoh's body didn't even budge an inch.

LABEL: 0x7866
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x79D1
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x79DF
STRING: "...Maybe there weren't enough balloons?"

LABEL: 0x7AC6
STRING: I don't think I need to tell you that... this was a doomed endeavour from the start.

LABEL: 0x7BDB
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x7BE9
STRING: "Ah, how 'bout this!! What if I had a folding chair or a bath stool instead?!"

LABEL: 0x7CEC
STRING: If you really want this to work, you should use military-grade balloons or giant balloons.

LABEL: 0x7D65
STRING: I told her my honest opinion.

LABEL: 0x7ECE
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x7EDC
STRING: "Oh, you... dumbass!! Why didn't you tell me that at the start〜〜〜!!!"

LABEL: 0x7FE2
STRING: She tells me off in a hysterical voice as she pats me on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x803B
STRING: No, no, no, we just met today... there's no way I could have warned you beforehand.

LABEL: 0x80A8
STRING: I bet she'll use this scene as the punchline of the video...

LABEL: 0x8105
STRING: I can't honestly say whether she's a genius or an idiot, but I laugh because her antics can be so dumb.

LABEL: 0x8182
STRING: For the most part, I'd rather just go about my life as normal...

LABEL: 0x81DD
STRING: But sometimes, it seems like it's not so bad to get involved with a girl like Cycoh.

LABEL: 0x82E3
STRING: In the meantime, it had already become dusk.

LABEL: 0x8340
STRING: I can't believe it's been so long since my yakisoba bread time.

LABEL: 0x83A5
STRING: I guess if you had fun doing it, even simple work goes by faster than you would have thought...

LABEL: 0x84B3
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x84C1
STRING: "Thanks for helping me out today! Having you as an assistant is seriously a godsend!"

LABEL: 0x85C8
STRING: No, no, no, I'm sure I didn't help that much, you're exaggerating...

LABEL: 0x8633
STRING: But if you were thanked with a big smile like that, you couldn't possibly feel bad, could you?

LABEL: 0x8734
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8742
STRING: "Maybe it's high time for me to get an assistant...?! Hehe, what can I say?"

LABEL: 0x88E9
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x88F7
STRING: "...Well then, I'll see you around, Metarou!"

LABEL: 0x89FF
STRING: After packing her large items into her rucksack, Cycoh headed for the park exit.

LABEL: 0x8A70
STRING: ...I wonder if she does this all the time by herself.

LABEL: 0x8AC7
STRING: I wonder if it's about the numbers. Like monetization, for example... I think I'd lose motivation if I didn't make a penny.

LABEL: 0x8B5C
STRING: Or maybe she's just doing it as a hobby, enjoying her youth without worrying about the money.

LABEL: 0x8BE3
STRING: She's a doofus, so it's not impossible... That it's not about monetary gain.

LABEL: 0x8C6C
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8C7A
STRING: "He〜y!"

LABEL: 0x8D44
STRING: When I looked in the direction of the voice, I saw Cycoh looking at me, waving her hands high up in the air.

LABEL: 0x8DB9
STRING: ...You're still here?

LABEL: 0x8EA2
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8EB0
STRING: "I forgot to tell you〜! Please subscribe to my channel〜!"

LABEL: 0x8FA6
STRING: ...Yes, yes.

LABEL: 0x8FDF
STRING: I waved my hand back at her, half amused, half exasperated.

LABEL: 0x9291
STRING: ...Hah, today was more tiring than usual.

LABEL: 0x92D6
STRING: I returned home and laid on my bed.

LABEL: 0x932D
STRING: Maybe it's because I did stuff that I don't usually do, but I feel like I'm really tired today.

LABEL: 0x93A2
STRING: I think I'm gonna fall asleep at this rate...

LABEL: 0x9478
STRING: I pull out my phone as I remembered.

LABEL: 0x94CB
STRING: I almost forgot. Let's look up Cycoh on Usatube.

LABEL: 0x952C
STRING: Hanabishi Channel, Cycoh...

LABEL: 0x9573
STRING: Usatube Channel, 580... thousand subscribers?!!?

LABEL: 0x95CB
STRING: With no limit in the number of competitors, it's no easy task for an amateur to reach this number.

LABEL: 0x965A
STRING: What... I-I think I've just met someone amazing.

LABEL: 0x96BB
STRING: It's hard to believe, but that's what it is.

LABEL: 0x9716
STRING: Oh no, because she said we're the same age, I carelessly spoke to her casually instead of being respectful.

LABEL: 0x978F
STRING: When she was talking about not going to school... I thought she was just a delinquent pretending to be a Usatuber.

LABEL: 0x980C
STRING: Anyway, I never thought I'd be able to get close to such an amazing person. Maybe I'm just super lucky?

LABEL: 0x989B
STRING: If I play my cards right, maybe I can become friends with her...

LABEL: 0x98F4
STRING: I could feel such deviousness sprouting somewhere in my head.

LABEL: 0x9953
STRING: I couldn't contain my excitement. That night, I spent all my time watching Cycoh's videos.

LABEL: 0x9C6B
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0x9CAC
STRING: A girl illuminated by the twinkling stars was talking with a boy.

LABEL: 0x9D1F
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x9D2D
STRING: "Here, for you."

LABEL: 0x9D82
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0x9D90
STRING: "What's this. ...Dice?"

LABEL: 0x9DED
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x9DFB
STRING: "Yeah, if you're ever in trouble, you should give it a roll."

LABEL: 0x9E6C
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0x9E7A
STRING: "...Huh, you want me to ask God for help?"

LABEL: 0x9EE3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x9EF1
STRING: "Well, yes. That's right, if you're in trouble, you should ask God."

LABEL: 0x9F70
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x9F7E
STRING: "This six-sided cube always gives the right answer."

LABEL: 0x9FF3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA001
STRING: "We can't resist the fate that God has set for us. Because that's how he made it."

LABEL: 0xA096
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA0A4
STRING: "But if you want to defy fate, you have to roll the largest number you can."

LABEL: 0xA117
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA178
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA186
STRING: "Did you know? When you add up the front and back of a die, it always comes out to the number seven."

LABEL: 0xA20D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA21B
STRING: "Please don't ever forget that."

LABEL: 0xA28A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA298
STRING: "It's a magic charm... to help you obtain glory."

LABEL: 0xA309
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA317
STRING: "...Are you an idiot?"

LABEL: 0xA372
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA380
STRING: "Ahaha. How cruel of you."

LABEL: 0xA3D9
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA3E7
STRING: "If such a thing could save me, I wouldn't be in this much pain."

LABEL: 0xA468
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA476
STRING: "Yeah, it's just a comforting thought to have."

LABEL: 0xA4DB
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA4E9
STRING: "...I hope I die soon."

LABEL: 0xA54C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA55A
STRING: "Why?"

LABEL: 0xA5A9
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA5B7
STRING: "The reason doesn't really matter. It's just a rationalization after the fact."

LABEL: 0xA62E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA63C
STRING: "Are there really people who wish to die for no particular reason?"

LABEL: 0xA6AD
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA6BB
STRING: "At the very least I don't want to die for such a vague reason. I can come up with a good reason every day."

LABEL: 0xA75A
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA768
STRING: "...It's got nothing to do with you."

LABEL: 0xA7D5
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA7E3
STRING: "You don't need to hide it like that. You're really not honest with yourself."

LABEL: 0xA864
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA872
STRING: "Is it because your mother and father don't love you?"

LABEL: 0xA8E1
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xA8EF
STRING: "...That's one thing, but there's something more."

LABEL: 0xA95C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA96A
STRING: "Then, maybe it's something that happened at school?"

LABEL: 0xA9D3
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xA9E1
STRING: "I must have hit the mark."

LABEL: 0xAA34
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xAA42
STRING: "They made fun of me all the time. They splashed water on me every day."

LABEL: 0xAABD
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xAACB
STRING: "They beat me up, kicked me, fed bugs to me, hurt me until I couldn't move."

LABEL: 0xAB74
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xAB82
STRING: "It's funny, who would want to live after being bullied so badly?"

LABEL: 0xAC15
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xAC23
STRING: "I don't even think about falling in love, there's no point in that anymore. Gender is something makes no sense to me."

LABEL: 0xACD2
STRING: Boy

LABEL: 0xACE0
STRING: "A lot of times I've wanted to die, to disappear. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this world."

LABEL: 0xAD79
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xAD87
STRING: "But yet... you couldn't bring yourself to tell anyone, did you?"
